text: 7.36 Kis 7.3, 12.41, 14.21, 16.1, 16.35, Nam 14.33, Sng 105.27 Yijip amɨl, tap mageptek okok kuŋay yɨbɨl gɨl, Yislel binɨb kɨlop dad ñɨg solwala Nɨkɨm apal ak tɨkɨlak agak. Tɨkɨl kɨd adaŋ amelak, tap mageptek okok gɨ yolɨgup agak. Man nep binɨb ma yelak nab okok mɨdɨl anɨgak, sub anep 40 tek yɨnak agak.
